name: Tether Together
detailed_description:
Tether Together is a 2-player cooperative platform game where you are tied together by a bond of souls. Work together to collect gems, avoid enemies, and jump into the black hole before the timer runs out!

Find a friend, drag them to your couch, grab a wireless keyboard, and start mashin' away! Don't hate each other too hard.
about_the_game:
Tether Together is a 2-player cooperative platform game where you are tied together by a bond of souls. Work together to collect gems, avoid enemies, and jump into the black hole before the timer runs out!

Find a friend, drag them to your couch, grab a wireless keyboard, and start mashin' away! Don't hate each other too hard.
short_description: Tether Together is a 2-player cooperative platform game where you are tied together. Drag your non-gamer friend's dead body over the finish line!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2 GHz Intel Dual Core
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible card
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X (10.7 or newer)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8600M or better / ATi Radeon 2400 or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
